casebody.data:
LEXISNEXIS RISK DATA MANAGEMENT, INC., et al.
v.
NC ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICE OF the COURTS, et al. No. 101PA14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 5, 2015. Reed Hollander, Raleigh, Christopher A. Mohr, for LexisNexis Risk Data Management Inc., et al. Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, for NC Administrative Office of the Courts, et al. Hugh Stevens, for The News and Observer Publishing Co., et al. William Jerad Rissler, for Consumer Data Industry Association. Phillip Absolom Harris, Jr., Joseph S. Dowdy, Raleigh, for Associate Professor Ryan Thornburg.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of September 2014 by Associate Professor Ryan Thornburg for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of August 2015."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).

ERVIN, J. recused.
